events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and have stored it in our system for further review.
The application has been categorized under the engineering cluster as the candidate has relevant experience as a software developer.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's hiring process moving forward.
The initial screening call was completed, and the candidate showed strong communication skills and technical knowledge regarding software development.
The candidate responded promptly and positively expressed interest in scheduling a technical interview to demonstrate their engineering skills.
A technical interview with the senior developer has been scheduled for the candidate to assess their coding abilities and problem-solving.
